description: These nutritionally approved beef and veggie pide are designed with kids in mind and are perfect for lunch or dinner.
name: Kids’ Beef & Veg Pide Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g Woolworths Heart Smart extra lean beef mince

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Divide dough in half. Using hands, stretch each dough portion to form 20cm ovals.
Combine onion, carrot, zucchini, cumin and paprika in a medium bowl.
Spoon vegetable mix over centres of dough, leaving a 2cm border. Crumble mince over vegetable mixture. Fold dough edges towards filling to create a border.
Bake for 20 minutes or until mince is cooked through and dough is golden and crisp. Cut pides in half. Top with spinach, tomato and yoghurt. Season with pepper and serve.
